channel.title: Custom items?!?!?
channel.description:
hey ermm.... yeh well ive kinda of wonted costom items like the white costom and black with red trimm items white with red or any costom items if u need to know server dtails i will happily say :
sk1ttles server source 317
need ny more ino at all plz ask and if u ganan send me a code plz tell me where to put the code/file-wateva u ganna give/send

item.title: Custom items?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @ug1yw4t3rm3l0n ug1yw4t3rm3l0n
item.description:
@ug1yw4t3rm3l0n wrote:

If your starting easy with custom items Ill give you this small thing easy to understand. Letrs use bandos gs as a example.

if(i == 15334){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0;//Recoloring class8.anInt174 = 7354;//item look class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 7355; class8.anInt200 = 7244; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Bandos godsword "; class8.aByteArray178 = "A great weapon, used by the best warriors.".getBytes();
as u see class8.anInt160 that is the recoloring. basically if you want a white gs change the value 0 which is pitchblack to 127 which is white.

Read full topic
